features.Primary Camera 1: 48 MP, f/1.8, 24mm (wide), 1.22µm, dual pixel PDAF, sensor-shift OIS
features.Primary Telephoto Camera: 12 MP, f/2.8, 77mm (telephoto), PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom
features.GPS: dual-band A-GPS, GLONASS, GALILEO, BDS, QZSS
features.Sensors: Face ID, LiDAR scanner, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer
features.Charging: Lightning, USB 2.0, Fast charging, 50% in 30 mins (advertised), USB Power Delivery 2.0, MagSafe wireless charging 15W, Qi magnetic fast wireless charging 7.5W
